Subjective.History of Present Illness: Include symptom dimensions, chronological narrative of patient's complaints, information obtained from other sources.
Subjective.PertinentPastMedicalHistory: Details of pertinent past medical history.
Subjective.Medication allergies: Patient has not had any stiffness or loss of motion of other joints.

Objective.LabData: History of Present Illness symptomsls of all pertinent labs, x-rays, etc. completed at the visit.

Assessment.AssessmentDescription: A one-sentence description of the patient and major problem.

ProblemList.ProblemDescription: Major problem description supported by findings.
Additional problem description supported by findings.

Plan.DiagnosticPlan: Develop a diagnostic plan including tests, procedures, consultations, etc.
Plan.FollowUp: Plans for follow-up, next scheduled visit, etc.
